title: UC basketball unveils new Under Armour uniforms
text:
UC basketball unveils new Under Armour uniforms 
Updated: Fri, Oct 16 2015, 01:00 PM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- Under Armour unveiled its newly designed uniforms for the University of Cincinnati men’s basketball team Friday. The uniforms made of ArmourVentTM technology feature a red and black proprietary stripe around the waistband and lower part of the shorts and back of the jersey collar. The stripe, created by Under Armour, highlights elements unique to UC and its beautiful campus. The angles represented were inspired by the angles on numerous campus buildings and structures. The white triangles are representative of the windows of the Richard E. Lindner Center located next to Fifth Third Arena and home to the UC Department of Athletics. UNIFORM TECHNOLOGYMore info on the Cincinnati ArmourVentTM uniform:• ArmourVent™ mesh is built to handle the worst heat—it’s tougher, dries faster & gives you true breathability• Smooth, stretch-woven fabric is ultra-lightweight & lets you move• ArmourVent™ mesh back delivers true breathability in a light, stretchy, durable, fast-drying fabricFor more, click HERE .
